document_data.name: Papyrus Pad
document_data.mainbody: '''Papyrus pads''' were items in the Realms often used by [[wizard]]s for writing.
document_data.Description: Papyrus pads were made from high-quality cross-grained [[papyrus]] stock pressed in [[Mulhorand]] and sewn along one edge by skilled craftsmen from [[Unther]] and [[Chessenta]].
document_data.History: These items were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 15 [[gold piece]]s per 25 sheets.
document_data.Notable Users: * Papyrus pads were favored by wizards.
